title: Quoteless Attributes in Templates can lead to Content Injection
author: Matias P. Brutti
overview:
Not using quotes around your attributes in mustache templates, could lead to content injection.

### Example
Template:
```<a href={{foo}}/>```

Input:
```{ 'foo' : 'test.com onload=alert(1)'}```

Rendered result:
```<a href=test.com onload=alert(1)/>```
recommendation: If you are unable to upgrade to version 2.2.1 or greater you can add quotes to your attributes in your mustache templates.
